ygData.subject: Python NEAT
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi people, For about a month I ll be writing a Python implementation of NEAT, which includes all advances in the recent years, including rtNEAT, phased

Hi people, 

For about a month I'll be writing a Python implementation of N=
EAT, which includes all advances in the recent years, including rtNEAT, pha=
sed searching, leaky integrators, HyperNEAT, HyperNEAT with evolving substr=
ates, and novelty search. Coevolution code and visualizations will be inclu=
ded. Optimized C++ code for running the NNs too. This code will be free and=
 I promise this will be the best NEAT code I can write. No bugs, no meaning=
less NNs, etc. 

Peter
